name: Elementals (itch) (RobinBOYO, Smunos!, hulian)
description:
This game was made for the 2021 GMTK Gamejam. You control 4 characters at the same time with each having a different way of attacking. You have to survive for as long as you can, it's not over until you lose all your characters! Losing a character isn't the end for them. You can bring them back by destroying the enemies they spawn.

Created by:

Andrei Pop - Programmer

Julian Bolivar - Programmer

Smunos - Artist/Musician
